summary:
A qualified Chartered Accountant (SA) and skilled financial controller with over 5 years' post-articles experience working for highly competitive and reputable organisations across various industry sectors including industrial products and services, consulting, financial services, as well as security and telematics. My key strengths include variance analysis, operational finance, building management tools and efficiencies for better decision making. My ability to be highly analytical and at the same time operationally astute ensures that I streamline the divisions I run to create highly efficient and profitable businesses. I am highly adaptable and able to work within corporate cultures with diverse teams of staff with technical specialities. 

▬▬▬NOTABLE PROJECT / SIGNIFICANT IMPACT TO EMPLOYER▬▬▬

Implementation of first technology-based cloud accounting solution in Africa Oracle Cloud Atlas Mara Ltd: Oracle Fusion Project (2017 – 2019)

•	Owning the Group's Oracle Cloud finance systems and delivered change in line with the Cloud business strategy, providing leadership, maintenance of finance systems architecture, and supporting the ongoing development of the Group's financial solutions.
•	Successfully implemented Oracle Fusion General- and Sub-Ledger for sixteen non-banking entities and Flexcube core banking integration into Oracle Fusion General Ledger and Sub-Ledger for the ABCH Group banking entities in Botswana, Zimbabwe, Tanzania, Mozambique, Zambia and Rwanda (T24 integration).

▬▬▬TOP EXPERTISE▬▬▬

✔Advanced Excel✔Consolidations✔IFRS✔Variance Analysis✔Process Optimisation✔Financial Reporting✔Cash Flow Management✔Performance Management✔Financial Statements✔Risk Identification✔Risk Identification✔Budget Management✔Industrial Services✔Financial Management & Planning✔Data Analysis & Reconciliations✔Consumer Industrial Products✔Group & Company Financial Reports✔Cloud Solutions

----------------------------
Available for contact on
Nadine.venter19@gmail.com

'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Sandton', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Atlas Mara Ltd.', 'description': 'Oracle Cloud Atlas Mara is a Financial Services group with banking operations in seven sub-Saharan African countries (Botswana / Mozambique / Nigeria / South Africa / Tanzania / Zambia / Zimbabwe) as well as Head Offices in Dubai and Mauritius. The Atlas Mara group also acquired Banques Populaires du Rwanda, which was also included in this project. 

Head of the Fusion Finance Data support team, leading a team of 5 members consisting of 2 Financial analysts (Chartered Accountants),1 Flexcube (coding) Expert, 2 IT Software Developers tasked with implementing the first technology-based cloud accounting solution in Africa: Fusion Oracle. Reported to the Head of Finance Systems. 

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

•	Prepared annual, quarterly and monthly budgets and forecasts for the Oracle Fusion project.
•	Built standardised reports for companies in Atlas Mara Group, as well as Group reporting and consolidation templates.
•	Trained personnel in terms of the Oracle Fusion Cloud solution, led report training in Oracle, as well as with the Financial Reporting Studio and SmartView tools.
•	Developed a standardised chart of accounts for general ledger, cost centres and business structures across the Group.
•	Reconciled, mapped, and uploaded history data into Oracle Fusion.
•	Presented on the Oracle Fusion Project at SteerCo and various Board meetings.
•	Provided technical support training to the involved countries with Oracle Fusion.
•	Led User Acceptance Testing (UAT), or End-User Testing, business user training and Show and Tell.
•	Built custom reports to assist with various reporting aspects, Including presentation of financial results for the entire Atlas Mara group, such as monthly/quarterly/annual results, budgets, forecasts, cost splits, etc.
•	Cost allocation and support function experience and setup.
•	Coordinated with multi-cultural and international contacts.
•	Ensured a smooth general ledger integration from the Core Banking Systems into Oracle Fusion.', 'title': 'Senior Financial Analyst: Oracle Cloud', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 309921, 'name': 'PwC South Africa', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQF6qc6B5rcU6w/company-logo_400_400/0/1688122136536?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=xWHPvBwu-fVpg-1HZF5eezJ5xXzsY14gGbgCRac6cXU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/pwc-south-africa/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'PwC South Africa', 'description': None, 'title': 'Senior Associate', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1044, 'name': 'PwC', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQGv_22548SaOQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1689197046877?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=ExPap1fji47kUzWW6Ci2VT3UwRDJfap4xCJPT4J8ZOc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/pwc/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'PwC', 'description': None, 'title': 'Trainee Accountant', 'employment_type': None}]}]
